original_title: 兄の前では冷たいお義姉さんと実はセフレのツンデレ同居生活 川上奈々美
overview: Nanami, a brother-in-law who is cold to me, but is not good at it. One day when I saw the AV, she suddenly entered my room (sweat. And for some reason I decided to watch the AV together without going out! That night, "Take responsibility for not being able to sleep (Teru") Crossing the line with my sister-in-law who came to Japan, a secret saffle life has begun! The stubborn attitude when you are with your family is a measure against your husband's sweating? Living with a family affair with a sister-in-law!
title: When She's With My Big Brother, My Big Sister-In-Law Always Acts Like A Cold Bitch, But The Truth Is That She's A Tsundere Fuck Buddy Roommate Nanami Kawakami
